name: Stachebold
description: A small humanoid creature covered in scraggly moustache hairs. Some believe they were born from the stray moustache hairs of Neo-Don.

name: Lesser Spice Troll
description: A servant worker for the Spice Troll faction. Often found mining spice in the spice mines. They lack intelligence, but can pack a punch.

name: Wandering Zellers
description: Wanders the hallways looking for someone to hand out his Twitch business cards to.

name: Barnticus
description: Legends say he runs a framing crew, but to your eyes all he wants to do is drink coffee, and then drink some more.

name: One of Brett's 3 Cats
description: Un-happy cats that abandoned their own and now roam the halls scavenging for food. Rumor has it that encountering all 3 at once is trouble.

name: B-NOS
description: A skeleton like humanoid with speed far greater than the average human.

name: Ogreklein
description: A large naked ogre, beware of it's naked dance of death.

name: Mother Klein
description: You can't even tell what this is. It appears to be a giant blob of a pink colored substance that seems to slide it's way towards you. Muffled sounds can be heard coming from within the blobs core.

name: Sorcerer Devon
description: A tall, bald sorcerer wielding the powers of calendar management and meeting charisma.

name: iChan
description: The iChan will interrupt your every sentence in order to gather more strength and power.

name: DDOS
description: The DDOS seeks out temperature differentials that are above it's specified threshold and attempts to correct them. Watch out for it's thermal monitoring attack!
